subsystems.name: First Wall/Blanket
subsystems.description: Plasma-facing components and breeding blanket. High neutron flux environment requires advanced materials.

subsystems.name: Neutron Shielding
subsystems.description: Radiation shielding to protect external components and personnel. Not needed for aneutronic fuels.

subsystems.name: Magnets (MCF)
subsystems.description: Superconducting magnets for magnetic confinement. Major cost driver with significant learning potential.

subsystems.name: Structural Support
subsystems.description: Structural framework and support systems. Mature industrial technology.

subsystems.name: Vacuum Systems
subsystems.description: Vacuum vessel and pumping systems for plasma containment.

subsystems.name: Power Supplies
subsystems.description: Magnet power supplies, heating systems, and auxiliary power.

subsystems.name: Laser/Driver (ICF)
subsystems.description: High-power laser or particle beam driver for inertial confinement. Very high learning potential.

subsystems.name: Direct Energy Conversion
subsystems.description: Direct conversion of charged particle energy to electricity. Required for aneutronic fuels.

subsystems.name: Tritium Handling
subsystems.description: Tritium breeding, extraction, storage, and injection systems. Required for D-T fuel.

subsystems.name: He3 Production
subsystems.description: Helium-3 production or supply infrastructure. Required for D-He3 fuel. Could include lunar mining or breeding from deuterium.

subsystems.name: Turbine Plant
subsystems.description: Steam turbine and generator for thermal-to-electric conversion. Mature technology.

subsystems.name: Balance of Plant
subsystems.description: Cooling systems, electrical systems, buildings, and site infrastructure.
